title: Nothing but issues today.
body:
So my old PC shit out on me not too long ago so I ordered a new pre-built since I don't feel like investing the time to build my own. 

It arrived today and I immediately started downloading League and even though this is a pretty high end PC, it took way longer than it should have. That's not what I'm worried about though, ever since it finally finished downloading I've been trying to log in. I enter my username and password and when I hit enter it sits there on "Authenticating..." for about 5-7 minutes then tells me "An unexpected error has occurred while logging in." The one time I did get logged in everything was so slow it wouldn't even load the home page (again, pretty high end PC and everything else is running smooth as ever). I tried the "full repair" to no avail, I tried enabling low-spec mode to maybe reduce client lag, didn't work. I tried downloading the Hextech Repair Tool but when I try to run it it'll get all the way to the "Gathering Logs" part and then I get a "Chromium Embedded Framework Client Application has stopped working" error.

I'm about to go out of my freaking mind. I'm trying to do everything I can without having to reinstall League because it took nearly 4 hours and I'm not willing to wait that long again. Someone please help me before I start smashing shit.

replies.body: Getting stuck on authenticating while trying to login just means your network wasn't able to get a clear signal with the login servers. Try updating a couple settings for me really quickly, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS. Follow these steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know how it helps.

>
> Getting stuck on authenticating while trying to login just means your network wasn't able to get a clear signal with the login servers. Try updating a couple settings for me really quickly, specifically Port Forwarding and DNS. Follow these steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know how it helps.

Before doing that I tried logging in, I sat on Authenticating for about 3 or 4 minutes but it finally logged me in. However, the client was so laggy that it wouldn't even load the home page. So I tried your solution and it didn't work at all. No change whatsoever, still over here on Authenticating watching this little wheel spin... anything else you can tell me?

That's alright, go ahead and run through the other steps in that guide if you haven't yet to cover all the basics. If those steps aren't helping at all, reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to do a lot more in-depth troubleshooting with you!
